Examples

SendHugeData.cpp File Reference

Demonstration of sending between 2 services big buffers. The 2 services are using 2 connectors. One to send, one to receive. After n exchange, the data are check to see if they are corrupted and *local* data bit rate are computed. More...

#include "SendHugeData.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Functions

int main (int argc, char *argv[])

Detailed Description

Demonstration of sending between 2 services big buffers. The 2 services are using 2 connectors. One to send, one to receive. After n exchange, the data are check to see if they are corrupted and *local* data bit rate are computed.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz
